statements: SELECT * FROM advocacy_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, public_awareness FROM advocacy_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, community_engagement FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE public_awareness = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_campaigns ORDER BY community_engagement DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, policy_changes FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE community_engagement > 100;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE public_awareness = TRUE;
SELECT campaign_name, community_engagement FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE community_engagement > 50 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, policy_changes FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(policy_changes) > 100 ORDER BY campaign_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE community_engagement BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT campaign_name, community_engagement, policy_changes FROM advocacy_campaigns ORDER BY community_engagement DESC, campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, public_awareness FROM advocacy_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, community_engagement FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE public_awareness = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS participants_count FROM campaign_participants GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, public_awareness FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE public_awareness = TRUE;
SELECT participant_name, campaign_name FROM campaign_participants JOIN advocacy_campaigns USING (campaign_id) WHERE community_engagement > 100;
SELECT * FROM advocacy_campaigns WHERE campaign_id IN (1, 3, 5);

SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM advocacy_campaigns LEFT JOIN campaign_participants ON advocacy_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_participants.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT * FROM policy_changes;
SELECT policy_name, impact_score FROM policy_changes ORDER BY impact_score DESC;
SELECT awareness_id, campaign_name FROM public_awareness WHERE awareness_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM community_engagement WHERE participants >= 100 ORDER BY participants DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name FROM policy_changes WHERE policy_name LIKE 'Health%';
SELECT * FROM policy_changes WHERE impact_score > 50;
SELECT policy_name, impact_score FROM policy_changes WHERE policy_id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef';
SELECT * FROM public_awareness ORDER BY reach DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, awareness_level FROM public_awareness WHERE awareness_level >= 3 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT event_name, participants FROM community_engagement WHERE participants > 1000 ORDER BY participants DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_changes;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policy_changes WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT awareness_topic, awareness_description FROM public_awareness ORDER BY awareness_date DESC;
SELECT engagement_id, engagement_type FROM community_engagement WHERE engagement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, impact_score FROM campaign_impact WHERE impact_score > 50 ORDER BY impact_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_changes WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_id, policy_name, date_enacted FROM policy_changes WHERE date_enacted >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM campaign_impact WHERE impact_score > 80 ORDER BY impact_date DESC;
SELECT engagement_id, engagement_type, engagement_description FROM community_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'Workshop';
SELECT awareness_topic, awareness_description FROM public_awareness WHERE awareness_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM AdvocacyCampaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM AdvocacyCampaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT change_id, policy_name, change_date FROM PolicyChanges ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT awareness_topic, awareness_description FROM PublicAwareness WHERE awareness_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT engagement_id, community_name, engagement_description FROM CommunityEngagement WHERE engagement_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY engagement_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM AdvocacyCampaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT impact_description FROM AdvocacyCampaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1001;
SELECT policy_name, change_date FROM PolicyChanges ORDER BY change_date DESC;
SELECT awareness_topic, awareness_description FROM PublicAwareness WHERE awareness_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT engagement_id, community_name FROM CommunityEngagement WHERE engagement_description LIKE '%community%' ORDER BY engagement_id ASC;
